Bob encrypted two messages with RSA but accidentally reused a prime in both keys. Can you recover the original messages from the ciphertexts below? 435814462457096787127586472914349315434760005343029525507397139154686590672525752571457635777101225449292331922960360176467784394741530036884710149050117162151506042702107519035361666254895371389169945865646497590776365032805346014

The flag format is flag{...}
n=441079775740596674876169530354460896786224073937995950277670779408474006531100163159617495913448611408995181448373100930760266127829206255407255226370412177225444507998371725887760634667328850003861493909682680179249813297110912129, e=188871894390580092174867696792696258748189551528202803989242166839779466792842502844721793344595861314626012606123738813354814611190293223072415545994256147993449800794511936601648410118032163581899497909753554461851210224785682353

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{4hmqx07k}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 435814462457096787127586472914349315434760005343029525507397139154686590672525752571457635777101225449292331922960360176467784394741530036884710149050117162151506042702107519035361666254895371389169945865646497590776365032805346014
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=441079775740596674876169530354460896786224073937995950277670779408474006531100163159617495913448611408995181448373100930760266127829206255407255226370412177225444507998371725887760634667328850003861493909682680179249813297110912129, e=188871894390580092174867696792696258748189551528202803989242166839779466792842502844721793344595861314626012606123738813354814611190293223072415545994256147993449800794511936601648410118032163581899497909753554461851210224785682353
extra_info: p=21001899336502798190821609514969237283547429600897969854186890566125941532702086778360165070588504450576936657224127, q=21001899336502798190821609514969237283547429600897969854186890566125941532702086778360165070588504450576936657224127, Ï†(n)=441079775740596674876169530354460896786224073937995950277670779408474006531100163159617495913448611408995181448373058926961593122232824612188225287895845082366242712058663352106628382784263445830304773579541503170348659423796463876
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
